short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an extension that can alias a certain page. You will be able to access the page with that name with a simple operation.
short.ja: You can set an alias for a URL. After setting, you will be able to use the alias to access the associated URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
USAGE
---
1. Click to ll button (On the upper right) in a favorite page
2. Register the favorite alias to the page
3. Focus the omnibox (Search bar) [Tips: There is a hot key `ctrl+l` or `cmd+l`]
4. Continue to type `ll` then pressing the Tab key
5. So you wanna go to enter the alias name of a favorite page
6. Please visit


UPDATE
